Authors: Girsang A.S., Sunarna D.A., Syaikhoni A., Ariyadi A.
Title: Business Intelligence for Education Management System
Source title: 2019 International Conference of Computer Science and Information Technology, ICoSNIKOM 2019
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Girsang, A.S., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Sunarna, D.A., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Syaikhoni, A., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Ariyadi, A., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The main function of school operations is scoring and reporting. Each of them is unique in every school and cannot be generalized although using the same curriculum. School personnel such as headmaster, teacher, and staff also not only assigned to one school location and can have multiple roles in each school location. With that complexity, a single query is not fast enough to generate a scoring report. This paper proposed the system business intelligence which can analyze the progress of student learning. This paper used nine steps to design a data warehouse as a tool business intelligence. The On-line Analytical Processing (OLAP) is used to analyze the data and visualize them using dashboard. By using data warehouse, each school can answer business question relation to scoring and visualize them in a dashboard to make a decision. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Business Intelligence; Data Warehouse; Report; Scoring; Socrates System School
Index Keywords: Curricula; Data warehouses; Education management; On-line analytical processing; School location; Student learning; Information analysis
